job.remarks: Daily at 6.00 new pricelists are created and uploaded to partners

step.datasource: SELECT i.[Itemcode] AS [Itemcode], i.userfield_04 AS [PMC], i.Userfield_02 AS [Category1], i.Userfield_03 AS [Category2], ISNULL(i.Userfield_05, i.[Description]) as [SalesDescription], i.sysmodified AS ItemModified, h.fullname AS ItemModifier, ISNULL(h.mail, 'iss@orlaco.com') as Email FROM [orlaco].dbo.items i with (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [orlaco].dbo.humres h with (NOLOCK) ON h.res_id = i.sysmodifier WHERE i.UserYesNo_03 = 1 AND i.Condition = 'A' AND (i.UserField_02 IS NULL or i.UserField_03 is NULL or i.UserField_04 IS NULL) ORDER BY Itemcode
step.contentbody:
Dear user,

The following items are recently added to the pricelist but the PMC or Category is not set.

Please correct the data in Synergy to make them visible in the sales pricelist.






ItemcodePMCCategory1Category2SalesDescriptionItemModifiedItemModifier
%Itemcode%%PMC%%Category1%%Category2%%SalesDescription%%ItemModified%%ItemModifier%
 


Kind regards,

Your automation team
step.stepname: Send mail for items without category

step.datasource:
----------------------------------------------------------------- --- Log price list changes VIEW [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist] --- Created on: 14-01-2021 --- Created by: Lenard Schouten ---------------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------------- -- NEW Items --------------------------------------------------------------- -- 1.0. SELECT NEW --SELECT Itemcode, PMC, Category1, Category2, OrdCat1, OrdCat2, SalesDescription, NL_EUR, USA_USD, USA_EUR, NL_Leadtime, USA_Leadtime, DiscountCode, Discount --FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist] --WHERE Itemcode NOT IN (SELECT Itemcode FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist])
-- 1.1. Log NEW INSERT INTO [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistLog](Itemcode, Field, NewValue, Description, ItemModified, ItemModifier) SELECT a.Itemcode, 'NewItem' AS Field, a.Itemcode as NewValue, 'Added to pricelist' + CASE WHEN a.Category1 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE ' in category ' + a.Category1 + ' - ' + ISNULL(a.Category2,'') END, ItemModified, ItemModifier FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist] a WHERE Itemcode NOT IN (SELECT Itemcode FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist])
-- 1.2. INSERT NEW INSERT INTO [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistHistory] (Itemcode, PMC, Category1, Category2, OrdCat1, OrdCat2, SalesDescription, NL_EUR, USA_USD, USA_EUR, NL_Leadtime, USA_Leadtime, DiscountCode, Discount, Number, ItemModified, ItemModifier) SELECT Itemcode, PMC, Category1, Category2, OrdCat1, OrdCat2, SalesDescription, NL_EUR, USA_USD, USA_EUR, NL_Leadtime, USA_Leadtime, DiscountCode, Discount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistHistory] a1 WHERE a1.Itemcode = a2.Itemcode) AS Number, ItemModified, ItemModifier FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist] a2 WHERE Itemcode NOT IN (SELECT Itemcode FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist])
INSERT INTO [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist] (Itemcode, PMC, Category1, Category2, OrdCat1, OrdCat2, SalesDescription, NL_EUR, USA_USD, USA_EUR, NL_Leadtime, USA_Leadtime, DiscountCode, Discount) SELECT Itemcode, PMC, Category1, Category2, OrdCat1, OrdCat2, SalesDescription, NL_EUR, USA_USD, USA_EUR, NL_Leadtime, USA_Leadtime, DiscountCode, Discount FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist] WHERE Itemcode NOT IN (SELECT Itemcode FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist])

--------------------------------------------------------------- -- Changed Items --------------------------------------------------------------- -- 2.0. SELECT Differences --SELECT a.* FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist] a --INNER JOIN [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist] l ON l.Itemcode = a.Itemcode --WHERE a.[PMC] <> l.[PMC] OR --a.[OrdCat1] <> l.[OrdCat1] OR --a.[OrdCat2] <> l.[OrdCat2] OR --a.[SalesDescription] <> l.[SalesDescription] OR --a.[NL_EUR] <> l.[NL_EUR] OR --a.[USA_USD] <> l.[USA_USD] OR --a.[USA_EUR] <> l.[USA_EUR] OR --a.[NL_Leadtime] <> l.[NL_Leadtime] OR --a.[USA_Leadtime] <> l.[USA_Leadtime] OR --a.[DiscountCode] <> l.[DiscountCode]
-- 2.1. Log Differences INSERT INTO [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistLog](Itemcode, Field, OldValue, NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, Description) SELECT a.Itemcode, 'PMC' AS Field, l.PMC as OldValue, a.PMC as NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, 'PMC changed from ''' + ISNULL(l.PMC,'') + ''' to ''' + ISNULL(a.PMC,'') + '''' FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist] a INNER JOIN [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist] l ON l.Itemcode = a.Itemcode WHERE ISNULL(a.[PMC],'') <> ISNULL(l.[PMC],'')
INSERT INTO [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistLog](Itemcode, Field, OldValue, NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, Description) SELECT a.Itemcode, 'Category1' AS Field, l.Category1 as OldValue, a.Category1 as NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, 'Category 1 changed from ''' + ISNULL(l.Category1,'') + ''' to ''' + ISNULL(a.Category1,'') + '''' FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist] a INNER JOIN [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist] l ON l.Itemcode = a.Itemcode WHERE ISNULL(a.OrdCat1,0) <> ISNULL(l.OrdCat1,0)
INSERT INTO [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistLog](Itemcode, Field, OldValue, NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, Description) SELECT a.Itemcode, 'Category2' AS Field, l.Category2 as OldValue, a.Category2 as NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, 'Category 2 changed from ''' + ISNULL(l.Category2,'') + ''' to ''' + ISNULL(a.Category2,'') + '''' FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist] a INNER JOIN [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist] l ON l.Itemcode = a.Itemcode WHERE ISNULL(a.OrdCat2,0) <> ISNULL(l.OrdCat2,0)
INSERT INTO [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistLog](Itemcode, Field, OldValue, NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, Description) SELECT a.Itemcode, 'SalesDescription' AS Field, l.SalesDescription as OldValue, a.SalesDescription as NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, 'Sales Description changed from ''' + ISNULL(l.SalesDescription,'') + ''' to ''' + ISNULL(a.SalesDescription,'') + '''' FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist] a INNER JOIN [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist] l ON l.Itemcode = a.Itemcode WHERE ISNULL(a.SalesDescription,'') <> ISNULL(l.SalesDescription,'')
INSERT INTO [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistLog](Itemcode, Field, OldValue, NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, Description) SELECT a.Itemcode, 'NL_EUR' AS Field, CONVERT(varchar,l.NL_EUR) as OldValue, CONVERT(varchar,a.NL_EUR) as NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, 'NL Euro price changed from ''' + ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar,l.NL_EUR),'') + ''' to ''' + ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar,a.NL_EUR),'') + '''' FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist] a INNER JOIN [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist] l ON l.Itemcode = a.Itemcode WHERE ISNULL(a.NL_EUR,.0) <> ISNULL(l.NL_EUR,.0)
INSERT INTO [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistLog](Itemcode, Field, OldValue, NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, Description) SELECT a.Itemcode, 'USA_USD' AS Field, CONVERT(varchar,l.USA_USD) as OldValue, CONVERT(varchar,a.USA_USD) as NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, 'USA USD price changed from ''' + ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar,l.USA_USD),'') + ''' to ''' + ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar,a.USA_USD),'') + '''' FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist] a INNER JOIN [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist] l ON l.Itemcode = a.Itemcode WHERE ISNULL(a.USA_USD,.0) <> ISNULL(l.USA_USD,.0)
INSERT INTO [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistLog](Itemcode, Field, OldValue, NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, Description) SELECT a.Itemcode, 'USA_EUR' AS Field, CONVERT(varchar,l.USA_EUR) as OldValue, CONVERT(varchar,a.USA_EUR) as NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, 'USA EUR price changed from ''' + ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar,l.USA_EUR),'') + ''' to ''' + ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar,a.USA_EUR),'') + '''' FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist] a INNER JOIN [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist] l ON l.Itemcode = a.Itemcode WHERE ISNULL(a.USA_EUR,.0) <> ISNULL(l.USA_EUR,.0)
INSERT INTO [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistLog](Itemcode, Field, OldValue, NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, Description) SELECT a.Itemcode, 'NL_Leadtime' AS Field, CONVERT(varchar,l.NL_Leadtime) as OldValue, CONVERT(varchar,a.NL_Leadtime) as NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, 'NL Leadtime changed from ''' + ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar,l.NL_Leadtime),'') + ''' to ''' + ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar,a.NL_Leadtime),'') + '''' FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist] a INNER JOIN [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist] l ON l.Itemcode = a.Itemcode WHERE ISNULL(a.NL_Leadtime,0) <> ISNULL(l.NL_Leadtime,0)
INSERT INTO [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistLog](Itemcode, Field, OldValue, NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, Description) SELECT a.Itemcode, 'USA_Leadtime' AS Field, CONVERT(varchar,l.USA_Leadtime) as OldValue, CONVERT(varchar,a.USA_Leadtime) as NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, 'USA Leadtime changed from ''' + ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar,l.USA_Leadtime),'') + ''' to ''' + ISNULL(CONVERT(varchar,a.USA_Leadtime),'') + '''' FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist] a INNER JOIN [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist] l ON l.Itemcode = a.Itemcode WHERE ISNULL(a.USA_Leadtime,0) <> ISNULL(l.USA_Leadtime,0)
INSERT INTO [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistLog](Itemcode, Field, OldValue, NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, Description) SELECT a.Itemcode, 'Discount' AS Field, l.DiscountCode as OldValue, a.DiscountCode as NewValue,ItemModifier, ItemModified, 'Max discount changed from ''' + ISNULL(l.Discount,'') + ''' to ''' + ISNULL(a.Discount,'') + '''' FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist] a INNER JOIN [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist] l ON l.Itemcode = a.Itemcode WHERE ISNULL(a.DiscountCode,'') <> ISNULL(l.DiscountCode,'')
-- 2.2. UPDATE Differences UPDATE [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistHistory] SET Active = 0 WHERE ItemCode IN (SELECT a.Itemcode FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist] a INNER JOIN [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist] l ON l.Itemcode = a.Itemcode WHERE ISNULL(a.[PMC],'') <> ISNULL(l.[PMC],'') OR ISNULL(a.[OrdCat1],0) <> ISNULL(l.[OrdCat1],0) OR ISNULL(a.[OrdCat2],0) <> ISNULL(l.[OrdCat2],0) OR ISNULL(a.[Category1],'') <> ISNULL(l.[Category1],'') OR ISNULL(a.[Category2],'') <> ISNULL(l.[Category2],'') OR ISNULL(a.[SalesDescription],'') <> ISNULL(l.[SalesDescription],'')OR ISNULL(a.[NL_EUR],.0) <> ISNULL(l.[NL_EUR],.0) OR ISNULL(a.[USA_USD],.0) <> ISNULL(l.[USA_USD],.0) OR ISNULL(a.[USA_EUR],.0) <> ISNULL(l.[USA_EUR],.0) OR ISNULL(a.[NL_Leadtime],0) <> ISNULL(l.[NL_Leadtime],0) OR ISNULL(a.[USA_Leadtime],0) <> ISNULL(l.[USA_Leadtime],0) OR ISNULL(a.[DiscountCode],'') <> ISNULL(l.[DiscountCode],'') OR ISNULL(a.[Discount],'') <> ISNULL(l.[Discount],''))
INSERT INTO [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistHistory] (Itemcode, PMC, Category1, Category2, OrdCat1, OrdCat2, SalesDescription, NL_EUR, USA_USD, USA_EUR, NL_Leadtime, USA_Leadtime, DiscountCode, Discount, Number,ItemModifier, ItemModified) SELECT a.Itemcode, a.PMC, a.Category1, a.Category2, a.OrdCat1, a.OrdCat2, a.SalesDescription, a.NL_EUR, a.USA_USD, a.USA_EUR, a.NL_Leadtime, a.USA_Leadtime, a.DiscountCode, a.Discount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistHistory] a1 WHERE a1.Itemcode = a.Itemcode) AS Number,ItemModifier, ItemModified FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist] a INNER JOIN [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist] l ON l.Itemcode = a.Itemcode WHERE ISNULL(a.[PMC],'') <> ISNULL(l.[PMC],'') OR ISNULL(a.[OrdCat1],0) <> ISNULL(l.[OrdCat1],0) OR ISNULL(a.[OrdCat2],0) <> ISNULL(l.[OrdCat2],0) OR ISNULL(a.[Category1],'') <> ISNULL(l.[Category1],'') OR ISNULL(a.[Category2],'') <> ISNULL(l.[Category2],'') OR ISNULL(a.[SalesDescription],'') <> ISNULL(l.[SalesDescription],'')OR ISNULL(a.[NL_EUR],.0) <> ISNULL(l.[NL_EUR],.0) OR ISNULL(a.[USA_USD],.0) <> ISNULL(l.[USA_USD],.0) OR ISNULL(a.[USA_EUR],.0) <> ISNULL(l.[USA_EUR],.0) OR ISNULL(a.[NL_Leadtime],0) <> ISNULL(l.[NL_Leadtime],0) OR ISNULL(a.[USA_Leadtime],0) <> ISNULL(l.[USA_Leadtime],0) OR ISNULL(a.[DiscountCode],'') <> ISNULL(l.[DiscountCode],'') OR ISNULL(a.[Discount],'') <> ISNULL(l.[Discount],'')
UPDATE [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist] SET [PMC] = a.[PMC], [OrdCat1] = a.[OrdCat1], [OrdCat2] =a.[OrdCat2], [Category1] = a.[Category1], [Category2] =a.[Category2], [SalesDescription] = a.[SalesDescription], [NL_EUR] = a.[NL_EUR], [USA_USD] = a.[USA_USD], [USA_EUR] = a.[USA_EUR], [NL_Leadtime] = a.[NL_Leadtime], [USA_Leadtime] = a.[USA_Leadtime], [DiscountCode] = a.[DiscountCode], [Discount] = a.[Discount], Sysmodified = GETDATE() FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist] a INNER JOIN [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist] l ON l.Itemcode = a.Itemcode WHERE ISNULL(a.[PMC],'') <> ISNULL(l.[PMC],'') OR ISNULL(a.[OrdCat1],0) <> ISNULL(l.[OrdCat1],0) OR ISNULL(a.[OrdCat2],0) <> ISNULL(l.[OrdCat2],0) OR ISNULL(a.[Category1],'') <> ISNULL(l.[Category1],'') OR ISNULL(a.[Category2],'') <> ISNULL(l.[Category2],'') OR ISNULL(a.[SalesDescription],'') <> ISNULL(l.[SalesDescription],'')OR ISNULL(a.[NL_EUR],.0) <> ISNULL(l.[NL_EUR],.0) OR ISNULL(a.[USA_USD],.0) <> ISNULL(l.[USA_USD],.0) OR ISNULL(a.[USA_EUR],.0) <> ISNULL(l.[USA_EUR],.0) OR ISNULL(a.[NL_Leadtime],0) <> ISNULL(l.[NL_Leadtime],0) OR ISNULL(a.[USA_Leadtime],0) <> ISNULL(l.[USA_Leadtime],0) OR ISNULL(a.[DiscountCode],'') <> ISNULL(l.[DiscountCode],'') OR ISNULL(a.[Discount],'') <> ISNULL(l.[Discount],'')

--------------------------------------------------------------- -- Removed Items --------------------------------------------------------------- -- 3.0. SELECT Removed --SELECT Itemcode, PMC, Category1, Category2, OrdCat1, OrdCat2, SalesDescription, NL_EUR, USA_USD, USA_EUR, NL_Leadtime, USA_Leadtime, DiscountCode, Discount --FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist] --WHERE Itemcode NOT IN (SELECT Itemcode FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist])
-- 3.1. Log Removed INSERT INTO [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistLog](Itemcode, Field, OldValue, Description) SELECT Itemcode, 'DeleteItem' AS Field, Itemcode as OldValue, 'Removed from pricelist' FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist] WHERE Itemcode NOT IN (SELECT Itemcode FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist])
-- 3.2. Delete Removed UPDATE [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistHistory] SET Active = 0 WHERE Itemcode NOT IN (SELECT Itemcode FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist])
DELETE FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelist] WHERE Itemcode NOT IN (SELECT Itemcode FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_VW_ItemPricelist])

DECLARE @nextversion varchar(10) SELECT @nextversion = RIGHT(CONVERT(VARCHAR,YEAR(GETDATE())),2) + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,CONVERT(INT,MAX(RIGHT(Version,3)))+1),3) FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistVersions]
INSERT INTO [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistVersions] (Version) SELECT @nextversion WHERE (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistHistory] WHERE Version IS NULL) > 0
UPDATE [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistLog] SET Version = @nextversion WHERE Version IS NULL UPDATE [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistHistory] SET Version = @nextversion WHERE Version IS NULL
select * FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistVersions] WHERE Syscreated BETWEEN DATEADD(HOUR,-1,GETDATE()) AND GETDATE()
step.stepname: Save reports to PROOM when version is created

step.datasource: select * FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_ItemPricelistVersions] WHERE Syscreated BETWEEN DATEADD(HOUR,-1,GETDATE()) AND GETDATE()
step.stepname: Backup reports when version is created
